title: Tactic Racing debuts ultralight hubs weighing just 215g…for the set!
content:
The new Tactic Racing TR01 hubset comes in at just 215g for the set, which they claim is 50g lighter than DT Swiss’ 180 hubs. An impressive feat, but something they say was 10 years in development and gives up nothing in terms of strength or performance. In fact, with their patent-pending conical engagement rings,

The post Tactic Racing debuts ultralight hubs weighing just 215g…for the set! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
